name: Jet Ducks HD: Free Shooting Game
name_original: Jet Ducks HD: Free Shooting Game
description:
NEW AND AWESOME!!!!

* Play the most addictive duck hunt simulator for FREE now!
* Free 5 round rifle is given away to all the users who have purchased original game.
* Download Jet Ducks now and experience free trial of new awesome upgrades.

Jet Ducks is a classic arcade-shooter mix inspired by Duck Hunt. There's never been a better time to play a brand new old fashioned shooter Jet Ducks on your device, because it is FREE now and with a greatly expanded weaponry it has become much more addictive.

Game Features:

-Blitz session mechanics
-Accelerometer controls
-Try 5 games with exciting upgrades
-Take advantages of new weapons
-Enjoy trendy cartoon graphics
- Compete worldwide with the Jet Duck Leaderboard
- Fun for all ages!

The rules stay the same: your dog helps you to locate ducks and your task is to successfully shoot down the birds. But this time there are no mere ducks, you'll stand against well-equipped birds with high-speed jet packs, paintball machine guns what makes them not an easy mark. And they can fight you back. If that isn't enough, Jet Ducks include a number of guns and supplement stuff. Every level gives you a free upgrade to try: radar upgrade, shotgun, rifle and machine gun M16.

Get excited by shooting ducks with additional weapon upgrades:

-Rifle upgrade allows 5 shoots before gun reload
-The Machine Gun shoots 20 rounds before gun reload
-Radar upgrade. Locates all the ducks on the lake

The game isn't just an endurance test but it's more like dynamic and rather addictive simulator of a real hunt thanks to great accelerometer controls. Rotate the device to aim, tap on the right to shoot, and tap on the left to reload. Make yourself comfortable! Feel free to change the position of your device during the session – your rifle adjusts to it in a second!

Get ready to the most comfortable fowling in your life. Ready! Set! Hunt!
